channel.title: Build Whonix Gateway 12 with no GUI
channel.description: In the physical isolation instructions, it tells us how to build whonix gateway with no gui for whonix 11, but it does not give the command for whonix 12. I assume it is still the same command then as in 11, and when building we just use --gui none? Is this correct?

item.title: Build Whonix Gateway 12 with no GUI
item.dc:creator: ob7
item.description:
Thanks for your quick reply.

Read full topic
item.source: Build Whonix Gateway 12 with no GUI
